Package src.main.bll

Class ProductBLL

java.lang.Object
src.main.bll.ProductBLL
public class ProductBLL extends Object
The methods of this class use the ProductDAO object to invoke methods from that class. The class has a list of validators and a ProductDAO object as fields. The methods in ProductBLL also validate the products that have been inserted/modified using validators.
